text: He slapped himself in the face and cuffed the sides of his head. Then by degrees the rotating objects slowed, and coming into focus took the form of the furnishings in Dan Brown's living room. He stood up unsteadily and looked about the room, trying to gather his wits. Outside the dusk was settling over Dow's Lake and the heights beyond were in silhouette, already a solid black.
handwritten_text: He slapped himself in the face and cuffed the sides of his head. Then by degrees the rotating objects slowed, and coming into focus took the form of the furnishings in Dan Brown's living room. He stood up unsteadily and looked about the room, trying to gather his wits. Outside the dusk was settling over Dow's Lake and the heights beyond were in silhouette, already a solid black.
